    • Method Detail

      • build

        private void build(java.lang.String masterFileName)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Uses the .building file to generate the graph, populating floor names, locations (per floor), paths (per floor), and inter-floor paths in order.
        Parameters:
        masterFileName - The building filename, not including the .building file extension
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if loading of any file fails

      • loadFloor

        private void loadFloor(java.lang.String f)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Loads all the locations and paths for a floor, using the .locations and .paths files respectively
        Parameters:
        f - The code of the floor to populate
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If loading of either file mentioned above fails
